---
name: "Event Categories & Color Coding"
about: "Categorize activities and use color coding for visual distinction."
title: "Feature: Event Categories & Color Coding"
labels: [enhancement]
---

**Summary:**
Add categories to activities (e.g., Sports, Academics, Arts, Misc) and use color coding in the UI.

**Details:**
- Add a category field to each activity.
- Use different colors for each category in the list and on the map.
- Allow filtering by category.

**Benefit:**
Improves navigation and helps students quickly find activities of interest.
